actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for payment by the United States for certain medical services and treatment provided to individuals suffering from physical injuries attributable to the atomic bomb explosions on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, Japan, in August 1945.

summary.text: Provides for payment by the United States, through the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare, of medical services and treatment provided to citizens and resident aliens suffering from physical injuries attributable to the atomic bomb explosions on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, Japan, in August 1945.

titles.title: A bill to provide for payment by the United States for certain medical services and treatment provided to individuals suffering from physical injuries attributable to the atomic bomb explosions on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, Japan, in August 1945.
